evaluation.overall_comment: The translation successfully conveys the technical information and main ideas of the original French podcast. The selection of specialized terminology is a strong point. Some lexical choices and phrasing also reduce the naturalness and fluency of the Spanish text, making it less polished than it could be. Addressing these grammatical and stylistic inconsistencies would greatly improve the translation's quality.
